name: Grimoire Showdown
description:
In this arena you can take the control of three distinct characters. None of them can attack enemies directly, but every one of them has some sort of power that allows then to lure enemies to one of the many dangerous places scattered around the arena. Use their abilities wisely!

Controls:
[WASD] or [Arrows]: Move;
[Mouse Left Button]: Shoot to mark enemies;
[Mouse Right Button]: Use secondary ability.
